chapters.title: Chapter 23:  Ornaments
chapters.info:
Norla,
      p. 534 (645)â€”Woman who died in her
      little house in the black hills after Cadsuane
      became a sister.  Cadsuane mused that if she were 50 years younger,
      Norla would have died before she had gone to the Tower, and much of
      history would have been different.
